column5: does anyone know of a good solid guide service on Rice and what species they off clients??  any advise would be appreciated.  Looking to take my boys out for a day of fishing and male bonding!!!!

The few that I know of are:  Most of them are multi species.  Ice and open water fishing you have Chris Giles Outdoors (highly recommended), Jimmy Dodd at Rice Lake Hut Rentals (905) 797-2132 and Sedgie at Lets Fish Guiding
